alert.note: Alert for Northern Meade Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Meade County through 630 PM MDT... At 600 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Enning, or 40 miles southwest of Faith, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... White Owl around 610 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Marcus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for west central South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Northern Meade Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains
